summary: Marvel's 'Captain Marvel' Casting Call for New Stand-ins
title: Marvel's 'Captain Marvel' Casting Call for New Stand-ins
body:
Marvel’s ‘Captain Marvel’ Casting Call for New Stand-ins

Marvel’s Captain Marvel is now hiring new stand-ins in Louisiana

Casting directors are now casting actors, models, and talent to work on Wednesday, July 4th in White Castle, Louisiana.

Producers are seeking the following types:

  • SI #3: Currently casting a 5’10” – 5’11” Caucasian looking male with gray, silver or salt and pepper hair (18+ years old) to work as a Stand-in! Please see reference photo…

View On WordPress

summary: Kevin Feige habla del Universo Cósmico de Marvel
title: Kevin Feige habla del Universo Cósmico de Marvel
body:
Kevin Feige habla del Universo Cósmico de Marvel

Poco a poco, el resto del universo va tomando más importancia en el universo cinematográfico de Marvel Studios. Thor nos presentó otros mundos, que han continuando siendo explorados en otras pelícuas. Como, por ejemplo, Guardianes de la Galaxia o Avengers: Infinity War, que presentaron nuevos planetas.

Pero no sólo los lugares nos avanzan la expansión del universo cósmico, sino también los…

summary: Dettagli sul costume di Captain Marvel da Samuel L. Jackson
title: Dettagli sul costume di Captain Marvel da Samuel L. Jackson
body:
Dettagli sul costume di Captain Marvel da Samuel L. Jackson

Le riprese di Captain Marvel proseguono senza sosta, ed i primi dettagli sul costume della nota supereroina sono emersi attraverso le classiche foto rubate dal set.

Come noto dalle parole di Kevin Feige, la supereroina Captain Marvel dovrebbe indossare più di un costume per tutta la durata del film, con uno di questi già mostrato attraverso le foto raccoltesul web. Quest’oggi, grazie ad un post…

View On WordPress

summary: This Avengers 4 actor might have just confirmed the plot device that could bring back the heroes | hollywood
title: This Avengers 4 actor might have just confirmed the plot device that could bring back the heroes | hollywood
body:
This Avengers 4 actor might have just confirmed the plot device that could bring back the heroes | hollywood

[ad_1]

Months after Avengers: Infinity War, fans are still trying to figure out theories, potential storylines, the characters we will see and also the plot of the upcoming fourth part of the Marvel juggernaut. They are ripping every Marvel actor’s interview to shreds, hoping to find a clue as to how the creative minds behind the movies plan to bring back the fallen superheroes back to life.

The…

summary: honestly that "carol and steve are similar so we have to dislike her" is so stupid and shows how little tony stans care abt...
question: honestly that "carol and steve are similar so we have to dislike her" is so stupid and shows how little tony stans care abt information that isn't about tony bc yes carol and steve are similar but they dislike each other! (in the beginning anyways) steve sees a lot of importance in team work and carol could give less of a shit about it bc shes sure she can handle anything on her own and she gets along better w tony so its like ? (just like a ps this how they get along in the comics, other shows)
answer:
i sent a recent ask about captain marvel and i just wanted to clear up that obviously stans aren’t required to know everything abt her and her movie is still p far away but they’re already s u p e r quick to judge her based on a small comment from the writers

Hey! Hope I’m not mistaken, and you are the same person who sent me both of these ! Otherwise, my bad ^^

It seems to be a mix of both tbh. I definetely remember reading some of them whine about that quote comparing Steve and Carol awhile ago, but I’ve also recently seen seem some tonies ranting about the Carol/Tony friendship on Twitter. So, it really depends. 

They overreact negatively at any piece of information that comes out of marvel studios. (what an awful thing it would be if she shared some some personallity traits with Steve *gasp*). But one person start talking about how close she is to Tony in the comics, and the whole tony community latch on to this relationship and start praising it with long threads or posts. As if they knew about it all along.

It seems to be a mix of both tbh. I definetely remember reading some of them whine about that quote comparing Steve and Carol awhile ago, but I’ve also recently seen seem some tonies ranting about the Carol/Tony friendship on Twitter. So, it really depends.

As if they knew about it all along.

summary: I just saw an article somewhere that said that there was never any confirmation that Captain Marvel was going to play a huge...
body:
I just saw an article somewhere that said that there was never any confirmation that Captain Marvel was going to play a huge role in the MCU and that somebody who saw the footage in Europe said she was going to be “taking the lead” in the MCU is the first confirmation like…..

I don’t remember who but somebody from Marvel already said that she’s going to be taking over the lead role in Phase 4………. Marvel literally said it themselves like a month ago……..

reblog.comment:
